languages.text: {n}В бледных глазах загорается дикий огонек.{/n} "Ты даже не представляешь, что такое уметь видеть ее. Чуять ее! Заглядывать в души других и видеть грех. Ты не знаешь, каково это — прозревать на лицах печать нечестивых деяний. А я — знаю! И ни один из них не укроется от меня!"

{n}Something wild sparks in her pale eyes.{/n} "You know not the first thing about perceiving it. Sensing it! Peering into people's souls and seeing the heinousness therein. You do not know what it's like to look at their faces and see the brand of their impious deeds. But I know it all too well! And none shall escape my wrath!"
languages.original_text: {n}В бледных глазах загорается дикий огонек.{/n} "Ты даже не представляешь, что такое уметь видеть ее. Чуять ее! Заглядывать в души других и видеть грех. Ты не знаешь, каково это — прозревать на лицах печать нечестивых деяний. А я — знаю! И ни один из них не укроется от меня!"

languages.text: {n}她苍白的双眼中闪烁着狂乱的火花。{/n}“你根本不清楚如何了解腐化！如何感知腐化！你根本不懂如何窥视人们的灵魂，察觉其中的罪恶。你也不明白看着那些人的脸，看到那些邪恶行为的烙印时，是怎样的感觉。但这一切我再清楚不过了！没有人能逃过我的怒火！”
languages.original_text: {n}Something wild sparks in her pale eyes.{/n} "You know not the first thing about perceiving it. Sensing it! Peering into people's souls and seeing the heinousness therein. You do not know what it's like to look at their faces and see the brand of their impious deeds. But I know it all too well! And none shall escape my wrath!"

traits.locale_text: {n}她苍白的双眼中闪烁着狂乱的火花。{/n}“你根本不清楚如何了解腐化！如何感知腐化！你根本不同如何窥视人们的灵魂，察觉其中的罪恶。你也不明白看着那些人的脸，看到那些邪恶行为的烙印时，是怎样的感觉。但这一切我再清楚不过了！没有人能逃过我的怒火！”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}彼女の目の中で、野性的な火花が散る。{/n}「お前は何も分かっていない。感じるのだ！魂を覗き、中に潜む凶悪性を見つける。誰かの顔を覗き込んで、不敬な行いの気配が見えた時の気持ちが分かるか？お前には分からないだろう。だが私には分かる！私の怒りからは、逃げられない！」
languages.original_text: {n}Something wild sparks in her pale eyes.{/n} "You know not the first thing about perceiving it. Sensing it! Peering into people's souls and seeing the heinousness therein. You do not know what it's like to look at their faces and see the brand of their impious deeds. But I know it all too well! And none shall escape my wrath!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の目の中で、野性的な火花が散る。{/n}「お前は何も分かっていない。感じるのだ！魂を覗き、中に潜む凶悪性を見つける。誰かの顔を覗き込んで、不敬な行いの気配が見えた時の気持ちが分かるか？お前には分からないだろう。だが私には分かる！私の怒りからは、逃げられない！」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Algo salvaje chispea en sus ojos pálidos.{/n} «No sabe lo más mínimo sobre percibirlo, ¡sentirlo! Mirar dentro del alma de la gente y ver la atrocidad que se esconde en ella. No sabe lo que es mirar a sus rostros y ver la marca de sus actos impíos. ¡Yo lo sé de primera mano! ¡Y nadie escapará mi ira!».
languages.original_text: {n}Something wild sparks in her pale eyes.{/n} "You know not the first thing about perceiving it. Sensing it! Peering into people's souls and seeing the heinousness therein. You do not know what it's like to look at their faces and see the brand of their impious deeds. But I know it all too well! And none shall escape my wrath!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo salvaje chispea en sus ojos pálidos.{/n} «No sabe lo más mínimo sobre percibirlo, ¡sentirlo! Mirar dentro del alma de la gente y ver la atrocidad que se esconde en ella. No sabe lo que es mirar a sus rostros y ver la marca de sus actos impíos. ¡Yo lo sé de primera mano! ¡Y nadie escapará mi ira!».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}In ihren blassen Augen blitzt etwas Wildes auf.{/n} "Ihr wisst nicht das Geringste darüber, wie man sie wahrnimmt. Sie spürt! Wie man den Leuten in die Seele blickt und die Schändlichkeit darin erkennt. Ihr wisst nicht, wie es ist, in ihre Gesichter zu sehen und das Brandzeichen ihrer lästerlichen Taten zu erkennen. Aber ich weiß es nur zu gut! Und niemand wird meinem Zorn entkommen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Something wild sparks in her pale eyes.{/n} "You know not the first thing about perceiving it. Sensing it! Peering into people's souls and seeing the heinousness therein. You do not know what it's like to look at their faces and see the brand of their impious deeds. But I know it all too well! And none shall escape my wrath!"

traits.locale_text: {n}In ihren blassen Augen blitzt etwas Wildes auf.{/n} "Ihr wisst nicht das Geringste darüber, wie man sie wahrnimmt. Sie spürt! Wie man den Leuten in die Seele blickt und die Schändlichkeit darin erkennt. Ihr wisst nicht, wie es ist, in ihre Gesichter zu sehen und das Brandzeichen ihrer lästerlichen Taten zu erkennen. Aber ich weiß es nur zu gut! Und niemand wird meinem Zorn entkommen!"
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Une lueur sauvage brille dans ses yeux pâles.{/n} « Vous n'avez pas la moindre idée de ce que cela fait de pouvoir la percevoir, la ressentir ! Scruter l'âme des gens et voir la cruauté qui s'y cache... Vous ne voyez pas la marque de leurs actes impies lorsque vous les regardez dans les yeux, contrairement à moi ! Et nul n'échappera à ma colère ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Something wild sparks in her pale eyes.{/n} "You know not the first thing about perceiving it. Sensing it! Peering into people's souls and seeing the heinousness therein. You do not know what it's like to look at their faces and see the brand of their impious deeds. But I know it all too well! And none shall escape my wrath!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Une lueur sauvage brille dans ses yeux pâles.{/n} « Vous n'avez pas la moindre idée de ce que cela fait de pouvoir la percevoir, la ressentir ! Scruter l'âme des gens et voir la cruauté qui s'y cache... Vous ne voyez pas la marque de leurs actes impies lorsque vous les regardez dans les yeux, contrairement à moi ! Et nul n'échappera à ma colère ! »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Solgun gözlerinde vahşice bir şeyler parıldıyor.{/n} "Yozlaşmayı algılamak, hissetmek konusunda hiçbir şey bilmiyorsun. İnsanların ruhlarına bakmak ve içlerindeki çirkinliği görmek, yüzlerine bakıp dinsiz eylemlerinin izlerine şahit olmak nasıl bir şey bilmiyorsun. Ben biliyorum işte! Bu yüzden gazabımdan kimse kaçamayacak!"
languages.original_text: {n}Something wild sparks in her pale eyes.{/n} "You know not the first thing about perceiving it. Sensing it! Peering into people's souls and seeing the heinousness therein. You do not know what it's like to look at their faces and see the brand of their impious deeds. But I know it all too well! And none shall escape my wrath!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solgun gözlerinde vahşice bir şeyler parıldıyor.{/n} "Onu algılamak konusunda hiçbir şey bilmiyorsun. Onu hissetmek konusunda! İnsanların ruhlarına bakmak ve içlerindeki çirkinliği görmek konusunda. Yüzlerine bakıp dinsiz eylemlerinin izlerine şahit olmak nasıl bir şey bilmiyorsun. Ben biliyorum ama! Ve gazabımdan kimse kaçamayacak!"
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
